title: Location
text: The conference venue is located in the heart of Mooloolaba, which is a short 12 minute drive from the Sunshine Coast airport. Direct flights to and from the Sunshine Coast are available via Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide, Cairns, and Auckland. Alternatively, the conference venue is about a 90 minute drive from Brisbane domestic and international airport, with public transport options available.

title: Australasian Applied Statistics Conference 2026
text: We would like to cordially invite you to Queensland for the Australasian Applied Statistic Conference 2026 (AASC2026) to be held from the 30th November to the 4th December 2026 at the Mantra Mooloolaba Beach on the Sunshine Coast. This in-person event is for anyone passionate about real-world data analysis, providing opportunities to exchange ideas in all areas of applied statistics, as well as encouraging networking and collaboration.

title: Accomodation
text: For delegates attending the conference who would like to stay at the Mantra Mooloolaba Beach, please use the promotion code AASC2026 to obtain a 10% off the advertised Flexible Daily Rate at the time of booking. You can contact the hotel reservations team on +61 7 5452 2600 Monday to Friday and quote the promotion code when booking. Please note no room block will be held and all room types are subject to availability at time of booking.
